A svájci Roger Federer legyőzte a spanyol Rafael Nadalt kedd este Zürichben a jelenkor két legjobb férfi teniszezőjének jótékonysági meccsén, melyet szerdán egy második követ Madridban. Az első találkozón a hazaiak kedvence 10 ezer néző előtt három játszmában, 4:6, 6:3, 6:3-ra verte világelső riválisát. A mérkőzés bevétele Roger Federer alapítványához kerül, amely afrikai gyerekek oktatását támogatja. "Különleges meccs volt a mai, amelyre mindig emlékezni fogok - nyilatkozta az összecsapást követően Federer. - Büszke vagyok rá, hogy sikerült megszervezni ezt a két találkozót." A spanyol fővárosban sorra kerülő mérkőzés bevételét Rafael Nadal alapítványának számlájára utalják a szervezők.
Hat idegenbeli mérkőzés után lépett pályára ismét hazai pályán a címvédő Los Angeles Lakers, amely súlyos vereséget szenvedett a tartalékos Milwaukee Buckstól az észak-amerikai profi kosárlabda-bajnokság (NBA) keddi játéknapján. Eredmények: Orlando Magic-Dallas Mavericks 99-105, Charlotte Bobcats-Oklahoma City Thunder 81-99, Chicago Bulls-Philadelphia 76ers 121-76, Memphis Grizzlies-New Jersey Nets 94-101, Sacramento Kings-Golden State 109-117 - hosszabbítás után Los Angeles Lakers-Milwaukee Bucks 79-98.
Egyre valószínűtlenebbnek tűnik, hogy télen, kölcsönben ismét Európában futballozzon David Beckham, amerikai klubja, a Los Angeles Galaxy ugyanis kijelentette: januárban visszavárja a tengerentúlra, hogy együtt kezdje meg a felkészülést társaival. A 35 éves angol játékos korábban azt mondta, bízik abban, hogy amíg télen szünetel a bajnokság az Egyesült Államokban, újra az öreg kontinens valamelyik együttesében futballozhat. A Galaxy ugyanakkor ehhez hozzátette: nem szeretné őt elengedni azok után, hogy egy éve súlyos Achilles-ín-sérülést szenvedett az AC Milan színeiben. Beckham emiatt kihagyta az amerikai bajnokság első hat hónapját, s lemaradt a dél-afrikai világbajnokságról is.

description.hltext_display: BYU downs Weber State
description.content:
Jimmer Fredette led all scorers with 28 points as No. 23 BYU narrowly escaped with an intrastate road win against Weber State, 72-66, at Dee Events Center.
Brandon Davies added 10 points and eight rebounds for the Cougars (11-1), who bounced back from their first loss of the season to UCLA on December 18.
"It was a great game and I thought our guys really competed hard," BYU head coach Dave Rose said. "Tonight was all about effort and desire to win from both teams, and our guys willed themselves to win."
Scott Bamforth posted 17 points for Weber State (6-5), which have dropped two of their last three. Kyle Bullinger added a double-double with 12 points and 13 boards, while Lindsey Hughey netted 15 points in the loss.
With the teams off to a slow start, BYU took its first lead, 9-7, over five minutes in when Charles Abouo made a jumper. A few minutes later, Chris Collinsworth jumper started a 15-5 run with a pair of free throws. Jackson Emery capped the burst with a three-pointer for a 28-14 margin with over six minutes remaining.
Noah Hartsock's jumper made it a 35-20 game with 2 1/2 minutes left in the first. It was 35-23 at the break.
Weber State fought back in the second half and had its deficit down to five, 58-53, on a Bullinger three-pointer with under eight minutes to play.
The Wildcats continued to claw their way back after Bamforth made a trey to make it a 67-63 game with 2 1/2 minutes left. BYU, however, was able to make 3-of-4 free throws to keep Weber State at bay.
Game Notes
The Cougars lead the all-time series by a 26-10 margin...Both teams struggled with their shooting. BYU shot 37.3 percent from the field, while Weber State made 37.9.

description.hltext_display: UNLV tops No. 11 Kansas State
description.content:
Oscar Bellfield made a key three-pointer late in regulation, as the UNLV Runnin' Rebels took down the 11th-ranked Kansas State Wildcats, 63-59, in the Hy-Vee Wildcat Classic.
Bellfield ended with 11 points for the Rebels (11-2), who defeated a team ranked as high or higher than No. 11 for the first time since the 2007 NCAA Tournament when they defeated then-No. 6 Wisconsin to advance to the Sweet 16.
Tre'Von Willis led the way with 16 points for UNLV, which has won two in a row since a two-game skid. Anthony Marshall tallied 11 points off the bench.
"We pride ourselves on keeping our heads up and always bringing a fight," Willis said. "It was a great crowd, and we knew it was us against everyone else. We knew we had to stay together and try to accomplish the win."
Nick Russell finished with 12 points for the Wildcats (9-3), who were forced to play without their top two scorers. Seniors Jacob Pullen and Curtis Kelly were ruled ineligible by the school prior to the game for a secondary violation of NCAA rules.
Rodney McGruder and Jamar Samuels each had 11 points for Kansas State, which has lost two in a row. Martavious Irving chipped in with 10 points.
Will Spradling's three-pointer and McGruder's slam has the Wildcats within one, 52-51, with 7 1/2 minutes to play. But Kansas State quickly went cold from the field.
Anthony Marshall's three-point play had the Rebels ahead by four, 55-51, with over seven minutes to go. The next points in the game didn't come until Jordan Henriquez-Roberts made two free throws for Kansas State with 5:50 remaining.
Another long scoring drought took place after Marshall made 1-of-2 from the foul line for a 56-53 margin with 5 1/2 minutes left.
Samuels made 1-of-2 free throws with 2 1/2 minutes to go, but Bellfield responded with a big three-pointer one minute later to make it 59-54.
"We were kind of struggling to get points," Bellfield said. "I got the ball, and I did not even think about it; I just let it go."
Kansas State finally made a shot from the floor when Irving made a layup with 22 seconds left. UNLV made 4-of-4 shots from the charity stripe the rest of the way to seal the victory.
"We are immature. Somewhere along the lines our guys think that you can win basketball games without passing the basketball," Kansas State head coach Frank Martin said. "We had six assists and 23 turnovers and all 23 were non- aggressive turnovers. It is frustrating to watch."
The Rebels raced out to a 15-7 lead early on. That margin increased to 28-19 on Bellfield's layup with under 6 1/2 minutes left.
Kansas State fought back with 10 unanswered points to take their first lead of the game. Irving's layup made it 29-28, and the Wildcats took a 34-32 edge into the locker room.
Game Notes
UNLV leads the all-time series with KSU, 4-2...Pullen and Kelly received impermissible benefits on the purchase of clothing at a Manhattan department store. Pullen, who entered the year as the Big 12 preseason player of the year, is averaging 16.5 points and 3.8 assists this season. He will miss three games for his actions. Kelly is averaging 10.3 points and 4.0 rebounds. The NCAA has yet to rule on Kelly's status...The Wildcats had won 28 consecutive non-conference home games dating back to 2007...UNLV head coach Lon Kruger, who not only starred for the Wildcats on the court as a two-time Big Eight Player of the Year from 1971-74, coached the squad to 81 wins and four NCAA Tournament appearances from 1986-90...Kansas State turned the ball over 23 times, leading to 21 UNLV points.
©2010 Sports Network. All rights reserved. This material may not be published, broadcast, rewritten, or redistributed.

description.hltext_display: Lumber production to be suspended for up to four weeks
San Diego State slips past Dons
description.content:
Kawhi Leonard recorded a game-high 23 points and 14 rebounds as No. 7 San Diego State slipped past San Francisco, 62-56, in the Las Vegas Holiday Hoops Classic.
D.J. Gay donated 14 points for the Aztecs (13-0), who have the nation's second-longest winning streak -- they trail only No. 1 Duke, which has won 20 in a row dating back to last season. Malcolm Thomas chipped in 10 points for the victors.
Michael Williams had 16 points for the Dons (4-7), who have lost four of the last five. Perris Blackwell and Angelo Caloiaro both posted 14 points in the loss.
SDSU jumped to a 10-3 lead thanks to Leonard's five points, but with 8 1/2 minutes left in the first half, Williams made a layup to knot the game at 14 apiece.
The game remained tight when the teams traded points while San Francisco still held onto a slim lead, 23-21, with five minutes remaining.
The lead tilted toward the Aztecs thanks to an eight-point spurt capped by a Leonard lay-in. Thomas made two free throws with less than 30 seconds left, but Caloiaro again tied the game with a three-pointer for a 31-31 score at the half.
Neither team built a lead bigger than three in the second half until Thomas' tip-in gave the Aztecs a 55-50 edge with just under three minutes to play. Gay added a layup during SDSU's next trip to extend the advantage to seven.
But San Francisco answered with four straight points to keep it close.
It was a three-point game after Rashad Green's three-point play with 23 seconds left, but Gay made 4-of-4 free throws during the final 19 seconds as the Aztecs held on to win.
Game Notes
The Aztecs shot 51.1 percent from the floor, while the Dons shot 42 percent...Leonard was 10-of-16 from the field...The score was tied 13 times with 12 lead changes. SDSU's biggest lead was nine, which was during the first half...San Francisco won the battle on the glass, 32-30.
©2010 Sports Network. All rights reserved. This material may not be published, broadcast, rewritten, or redistributed.

description.hltext_display: 国土部官员：房地产不应成为重要经济支柱产业
Benn, Richards send Stars over Canadiens 5-2
description.content:
Dallas Stars center Steve Ott (29) pushes Montreal Canadiens center Jeff Halpern (15) off his skates and into the boards during the second period of an NHL hockey game in Dallas, Tuesday, Dec. 21, 2010. At right is Stars center Mike Ribeiro (63).
DALLAS—Adam Burish and Jamie Benn provided the early momentum, then the Dallas Stars finished what they started.
Benn scored a short-handed goal, Brad Richards added a power-play tally, and the surging Stars beat the Montreal Canadiens 5-2 on Tuesday night. The Stars have won 13 straight and are 16-2 when they score first.
"We wanted to pounce on them," said Richards, who has a team-high 16 goals. "We got a lead and never gave it up. It was a great effort all the way through."
Burish, Karlis Skrastins and Loui Eriksson added even-strength goals for the Stars, 10-0-2 in their last 12 at home. Stephane Robidas had three assists, and Kari Lehtonen made 27 saves to help Dallas improve to 11-2-2 in its last 15.
"We've had a lot of that, scoring by committee," said Dallas' Steve Ott, who had two assists. "Short-handed, power play, even strength, we're finding a way."
Carey Price, starting for the 10th time in 11 games, allowed all five goals on 17 shots for Montreal.
"It wasn't good all around," Price said. "We couldn't get a break. That's a team that's a blue-collar team. They brought a lunch-bucket effort and got rewarded for it."
Brian Gionta scored a short-handed goal and Mathieu Darche added an even-strength goal for the Canadiens, 1-5 in their last six. Montreal played the second game of a seven-game trip.
Burish's deflection off Ott's pass gave the Stars the lead at 6:59 of the first period. Burish batted at the
puck with his stick, about waist high, and the goal stood up after a video review.
Benn broke through two defenders and backhanded a shot through Price's pads to make it 2-0 at 13:59 of the first period. Montreal had gone on the power play 16 seconds earlier.
"That short-handed goal really spurred us on," Stars coach Marc Crawford said.
Skrastins stretched the advantage to 3-0 at 2:31 of the second when he buried a rebound past Price.
Darche scored when the puck glanced off his skate and past Lehtonen, making it 3-1 at 10:43 of the second.
But Richards' shot from the left point went in off Montreal defenseman Josh Gorges at 17:00 of the second period to restore Dallas' three-goal lead.
Gionta's goal from the left circle at 12:15 of the third drew the Canadiens within 4-2, but Eriksson answered with a redirect 53 seconds later for his 100th career goal.
"It's fun to achieve that, but I want to keep it going," Eriksson said.
NOTES: It was the only meeting this season between the teams. ... Darche's goal also withstood a video review, when it was determined he didn't kick the puck into the net. ... The Stars hadn't beaten the Canadiens since Dec. 23, 2007. ... The crowd of 17,805 was one of the best attended home games for the Stars this season. "When you're playing an Original Six team, there's always added emotion in the crowd," Crawford said. ... Benn has two of Dallas' four short-handed goals. ... Skrastins scored his second goal of the season and 31st of his career in his 792nd game. ... Dallas scored on four of its first 12 shots. ... Dallas has a power-play goal in six straight games. ... The Stars are 10-2 against the Eastern Conference.

description.hltext_display: 叶檀：存量房不征房产税是对公平原则的亵渎
description.content: 中国经济网北京12月22日讯 昨日，著名财经评论人叶檀发表题为《楼市车市调控为何起反作用？》的博文。文章指出， 楼市调控未见成效，车市调控越调越热，这就是中国经济调控下的真实情形。如此悖反的情况是货币泡沫与通胀压力的必然恶果，更是公众预期税收不公平的理性反应。

description.hltext_display: Bruidegom slacht bruid, getuige en zichzelf
description.author: Spits Redactie
description.content:
Een Braziliaanse bruidegom beëindigde zijn trouwreceptie met de woorden dat hij 'een verrassing' had voor zijn gasten. Vervolgens trok hij zijn gun en knalde zijn kersverse echtgenote en getuige neer. Daarna maakte hij ook een einde aan zijn eigen leven. Het is nog onduidelijk waarom de man tot zijn 'verassing' kwam. Zowel lokale politielui als de geschokte families van het bruidskoppel hebben geen enkele verklaring voor de daden van de man.
"Hij leek gelukkig, zij leek gelukkig", zegt de zus van de bruid. "Zijn hele familie aanbad haar - niemand begrijpt dit drama. Hij heeft zichzelf als een sociopaat ontmaskerd, die zijn hele familie beloog en vervolgens zowel zijn grote liefde als zijn beste vriend vermoordde." Spits Redactie

description.hltext_display: Fresno Church Faces Eminent Domain
description.content:
Posted:
Featured Video
Fresno Church Faces Eminent Domain
Fresno, Calif. (KMPH News) – Parents in southeast Fresno will finally get the elementary school they've demanded for years. But, first the school district will have to demolish a church to make room. The small house of worship is located on Cedar and Heaton.
KMPH News Reporter Norma Yuriar spoke to the church pastor and he doesn't want to sell, at least not at the price Fresno Unified is offering.

description.hltext_display: Drive-by Shooting Suspect Shot By Fresno Police, Hospitalized
description.content:
Posted:
Updated:
Wednesday, December 22, 2010 3:05 AM EST
Featured Video
Live Report: Officer-Involved Shooting
Chief Gives News Conference
FRESNO, California (KMPH.com) -- Fresno Police are investigating an officer-involved shooting, east of the downtown area.
It happened at about 8:45 p.m. Tuesday night near 3rd Street & Platt Avenue. That's in a residential area, just south of the Derrel's Mini Storage on Tulare Street.
Fresno Police Chief Jerry Dyer said the suspect, a man, had shot at a nearby home (at 3706 E. Mono) minutes earlier, and then tried to get away by jumping out a pickup near Platt & 4th. Dyer said an officer with the Violent Crimes Impact Team (VCIT) tried to stop the suspect, before ultimately opening fire when the man didn't stop.
Police officers found the man hiding in the backyard of someone's home, with a gunshot wound to his arm. They also found a gun on top of a storage facility at a nearby Derrel's Mini Storage.
The suspect was transported to Community Regional Medical Center in downtown Fresno, in stable condition, recovering from the gunshot wound and a police K9 dog bite.
Dyer believes Tuesday's drive-by shooting may be related to other shootings involving tagging crews, as well as a murder.
Stay tuned to KMPH News & KMPH.com for the latest on this developing story.

description.hltext_display: Filipino gunmen free 2 Malaysians after 10 months
description.content:
MANILA, Philippines—Police in the volatile southern Philippines say gunmen with ties to al-Qaida-linked militants have freed two Malaysian laborers from 10 months of jungle captivity.
National police chief Raul Bacalzo said police commandos found the two near Bongao town in southernmost Tawi-Tawi island province late Tuesday. He said the gunmen linked to the notorious kidnap and terrorist group Abu Sayyaf abandoned the hostages after they were encircled by government forces.
The hostages were seized Feb. 8 from a seaweed farm in Malaysia's Sabah state and whisked away in a speedboat to nearby Philippine waters in a pattern similar to past kidnappings blamed on the Abu Sayyaf.

description.hltext_display: 17% of young Utahns score too low on military exam to enlist
description.content:
The Salt Lake Tribune
Updated 39 minutes ago Updated Dec 22, 2010 12:52AM
More than one in five young people nationwide who try to enlist in the military score too low on its entrance exam, according to a report released Tuesday.
But in Utah, young applicants fared better, with 16.7 percent failing the exam, according to the report from The Education Trust.
Utah had the ninth lowest percentage of young people in the nation who were ineligible to enlist in the U.S. Army because they failed the exam. In Utah, 16.7 percent of 2,354 high school graduates ages 17-20 who took the test between 2004 and 2009 tested too low to enlist.
Utah Latinos didn’t fare as well, though, compared to their peers nationwide. Among Utah Latinos who took the test, 31.3 percent tested too low to be eligible to serve — greater than the national average of 29.1 percent for Latinos.
Young, white Utahns performed better than the national average, 14th in the nation for the lowest percentage to test ineligible to serve.
Applicants must take U.S. Army’s Armed Services Vocational Aptitude Battery (ASVAB) tests to determine if they qualify for enlistment and, if so, what occupations they’re prepared for. The report measured whether applicants scored high enough on four of the ASVAB subtests — math knowledge, arithmetic reasoning, word knowledge, and paragraph comprehension — to qualify for enlistment.
“The findings should trouble high school educators most of all, because this shatters the comfortable myth that academically underprepared students will find in the military a second-chance pathway to success,” wrote Kati Haycock, Education Trust president, in a statement within the report.
Nationwide, Wyoming had the lowest percentage of students overall who failed the exam; Hawaii had the highest.

event_or_fact.property: ?The findings should trouble high school educators most of all, because this shatters the comfortable myth that academically underprepared students will find in the military a second-chance pathway to success,?

description.hltext_display: 出境游少带现金多刷卡
description.content: 现在网消息 本报讯(记者 杨金金)“出境旅游可以带少量外汇，能支付出租车费、电话费即可，其他消费使用双币信用卡最划算。”随着圣诞、元旦双节临近，江城又迎来出境游的小高峰，专家提醒，境外消费少带现金多刷卡。 理财专家介绍，境外消费使用双币信用卡最划算。出境旅游如果兑换太多外币，随时要承担贬值风险，使用双币信用卡消费除了能透支消费，很多银行还推出了双币信用卡订机票、酒店、购物等优惠便捷服务等。 国内双币信用卡大多都是人民币和美元的双币卡，使用这种信用卡在境外消费时，是将当地的物价折算成美元，再将美元折算成人民币，因此，消费者每次消费都要支付两次货币兑换费，理财专家提醒，最好在出游前按照目的地使用的币种选择信用卡。 [编辑: 王好] 分享: 【 大 中 小 】【 rss订阅 】【 打印 】【 关闭 】 近日热点 市场预期年内或再加息 各大银行提前还贷潮涌现 2010 12/20 06:56 "年终工作总结"愁煞上班族 恶搞版网上疯传 2010 12/21 14:46 媒体称明起汽柴油每吨分别上调310元300元 2010 12/21 17:31 白领该去哪打拼 中国未来5大"聚宝地"(图) 2010 12/21 14:26 银行收费项目太多? 教你做"逃费达人" 2010 12/21 14:09 月供3000元 中年教师家庭如何过上无忧生活 2010 12/20 15:17 济南推出奢华圣诞大餐10万一桌 吃的不是饭 2010 12/20 15:41 80后硕士生回收废品 毕业前买车买房揽女友 2010 12/21 14:19 李宁进军体育地产受挫 市值一天内缩水30亿 2010 12/21 14:26 最牛购房者出书 与开发商死扛三年获赔(图) 2010 12/20 15:43

description.hltext_display: തിരുവാതിര കളിക്കിടെ കുഴഞ്ഞുവീണ യുവതി മരിച്ചു
description.content:
കൂരോപ്പട: ധനുമാസത്തിരുവാതിര കളിക്കിടെ കുഴഞ്ഞു വീണ യുവതി മരിച്ചു. മാടപ്പാട്ട ആനന്ദ ഭവനില്‍ (എള്ളുകാലായില്‍) വേണുഗോപാലന്‍ നായരുടെ ഏകമകള്‍ രമ്യ വി. നായരാ (25)ണ്‌ മരിച്ചത്‌. ഇന്നു പുലര്‍ച്ചെ 1.30നാണ്‌ സംഭവം.
മാടപ്പാട്‌ ക്ഷേത്രത്തിനടുത്തുള്ള 704-ാം നമ്പര്‍ എന്‍.എസ്‌.എസ്‌. കരയോഗമന്ദിരത്തില്‍ നടന്ന തിരുവാതിരക്കളിക്കിടെയാണ്‌ രമ്യ കുഴഞ്ഞുവീണത്‌. ഉടന്‍ സമീപത്തെ സ്വകാര്യ ആശുപത്രിയില്‍ എത്തിച്ചെങ്കിലും ജീവന്‍ രക്ഷിക്കാനായില്ല. സംസ്‌കാരം ഇന്ന്‌ രണ്ടിന്‌ വീട്ടുവളപ്പില്‍. പുഷ്‌പകുമാരിയമ്മയാണ്‌ മാതാവ്‌. � Other Head Linesഅണക്കെട്ടുകള്‍ സന്ദര്‍ശിക്കാം� PHOTOVIDEOBLOGMANGALAM SPECIALPHOTOVIDEOBLOGMANGALAM SPECIAL �� PHOTOVIDEOBLOGMANGALAM SPECIAL � 1.� LettersPHOTOVIDEOBLOGMANGALAM SPECIALPublicationsDiscussionChatBlogPublicationsDiscussionChatBlogPublicationsDiscussionChatBlog� 1.� General Chat� 2.� room1� 3.� Room 2� LoginPublicationsDiscussionChatBlog� 1.� LettersCAST YOUR VOTE News Search in മലയാളം, Varamozhi format [Help]HideUseful linksIndian RailwaysFlight TimingsTelephone DirectoryFestival CalendarYour paycheckDistance CalculatorKerala Tourism © Copyright Mangalam Publishers 2010. description.hltext_display: Lib Dem Ministers’ Fears Caught On Tape
description.content:
A string of Liberal Democrat ministers have been secretly recorded using phrases such as “train wreck” and “deeply damaging” to describe Government policies.
Scotland Secretary Michael Moore, pensions minister Steve Webb and business minister Ed Davey are the latest politicians to be taped by Daily Telegraph reporters posing as constituents.
Mr Moore described the increase in tuition fees to a maximum £9,000 as “the biggest, ugliest, most horrific thing in all of this… a car crash, a train wreck”, the paper said.
He told the undercover reporters: “I’ve just done the worst crime a politician can commit, the reason most folk distrust us as a breed. I’ve had to break a pledge and very, very publicly.”
Mr Moore said the move was “deeply damaging” to Lib Dems, who had promised to abolish fees.
Mr Webb expressed “worries” about the child benefit cut which will hit couples where one partner earns just over the £42,000 higher-rate threshold.
Mr Davey said plans to limit housing benefit would hit some of the poorest in society.
“Their housing benefit cuts are going to mean, in my view, if they go through, that some people who are on the breadline will be put below the breadline,” he said.
Mr Moore was also quoted as saying the coalition had “marginalised” the Conservative right wing, which, he said, “hate us with a passion – and I can’t say it’s unreciprocated”.
Insisting that Lib Dem ministers “remain passionately Liberal Democrat”, the Scottish Secretary said some Conservative ministers were “on a different planet”.
Mr Webb said Lib Dems had acted behind the scenes to stop a lot of Tory proposals.
But he admitted they risked looking “too cosy” with their coalition partners by hiding their differences in public.
All three spoke to reporters posing as voters from the MPs’ local area.
The same tactic led to Mr Cable having to apologise and deny he would quit the coalition and “bring down the Government”.
It later emerged he had also “declared war” on Rupert Murdoch’s bid to take ownership of BSkyB, the parent company of Sky News, despite being required to remain objective on the issue.

description.hltext_display: കുളമാവ്‌ അപകടം: ഒരു സ്‌ത്രീ കൂടി മരിച്ചു
description.content:
ഇടുക്കി: കുട്ടിയുടെ പേരിടീല്‍ ചടങ്ങില്‍ പങ്കെടുത്തു മടങ്ങിയ ചേര്‍ത്തല സ്വദേശികള്‍ സഞ്ചരിച്ച മിനി ടൂറിസ്‌റ്റ് ബസ്‌ കുളമാവില്‍ കൊക്കയിലേക്കു മറിഞ്ഞുണ്ടായ അപകടത്തില്‍ പരിക്കേറ്റു ചികില്‍സയിലായിരുന്ന തുറവൂര്‍ ചാവടി കരോട്ട്‌ ബാബുവിന്റെ ഭാര്യ ഗീത മരിച്ചു.
മക്കള്‍: പ്രശാന്ത്‌, പ്രസീദ. തുറവൂര്‍ പഞ്ചായത്ത്‌ 13-ാം വാര്‍ഡില്‍ ചാണിയില്‍ ബാഹുലേയന്റെ മകന്‍ ബാലകൃഷ്‌ണ(26)നാണ്‌ അപകടത്തില്‍ മരിച്ച മറ്റൊരാള്‍. കുളമാവ്‌ ഡാമിനു സമീപം മുത്തിയുരുണ്ടയാറിനും പാറമടയ്‌ക്കും ഇടയിലുള്ള വളവിലാണു ബസ്‌ അമ്പതടിയോളം താഴ്‌ചയിലേക്കു മറിഞ്ഞത്‌.
ചേര്‍ത്തല തുറവൂര്‍ ചാവടിക്കരോട്ട്‌ ശ്രീജിത്തിന്റെ കുട്ടിയുടെ പേരിടീല്‍ ചടങ്ങിനു തങ്കമണിയിലെ പ്രകാശ്‌ കരിക്കിന്‍മേടിലെ കരോട്ട്‌ വീട്ടിലെത്തി മടങ്ങിയവരാണ്‌ അപകടത്തില്‍പ്പെട്ടത്‌. � Other Head Linesഅണക്കെട്ടുകള്‍ സന്ദര്‍ശിക്കാം� PHOTOVIDEOBLOGMANGALAM SPECIALPHOTOVIDEOBLOGMANGALAM SPECIAL �� PHOTOVIDEOBLOGMANGALAM SPECIAL � 1.� LettersPHOTOVIDEOBLOGMANGALAM SPECIALPublicationsDiscussionChatBlogPublicationsDiscussionChatBlogPublicationsDiscussionChatBlog� 1.� General Chat� 2.� room1� 3.� Room 2� LoginPublicationsDiscussionChatBlog� 1.� LettersCAST YOUR VOTE News Search in മലയാളം, Varamozhi format [Help]HideUseful linksIndian RailwaysFlight TimingsTelephone DirectoryFestival CalendarYour paycheckDistance CalculatorKerala Tourism © Copyright Mangalam Publishers 2010. description.hltext_display: 2010年家电股“最”看点 最惨烈内讧和最决绝抗议
description.content: 最惠民的家电政策：以旧换新、家电下乡拉动内需 2010年的家电市场可谓连逢利好，作为家电行业两大“新政”：“以旧换新”“家电下乡”等刺激内需的政策，对启动农村市场、激活城市更新市场、推进节能产品的消费与生产可谓发挥了重要作用。 商务部、财政部、环保部三部委昨日联合发布了《家电以旧换新推广工作方案》，家电以旧换新政策推广实施期延长至2011年12月31日，并在原9个试点省市的基础上增加19个实施省市，同时还将逐步向全国推广。 以旧换新政策沿用去年的补贴方法，消费者交售旧家电并购买新家电的，可享受新家电销售价格10%的补贴，此政策一推出便在家电市场掀起一番换、购热潮，据了解，截至目前，作为以旧换新的五大品类的空调、冰箱、洗衣机、彩电、电脑，在该政策下销售额突破1000亿元。 2010年2月4日下午，商务部、财政部以及工信部联合对最新一期的家电下乡中标产品进行了公示，公示显示共178家企业有望首次入围家电下乡。此前，财政部、国家发改委联合印发了通知称，对高效节能空调补贴推广政策进行调整，并将该政策自2010年6月1日起再延长一年。 相关数据显示，今年1-10月份，全国家电下乡产品累计销售5951.4万台，实现销售额1323.1亿元，比上年同期分别增长1.4倍和1.9倍。从数据上我们可以清晰地看到家电下乡的确带来了巨大的经济效益，同时也让各种家电走入寻常百姓家，提升了农村家电生活质量。 最惨烈的内讧：国美控股权之争 8月4日，从黄光裕一封要求召开股东大会罢免陈晓等职位的函件开始，两个性格、背景、价值观迥异的男人便从惺惺相惜、彼此信任、尊重，到走向决裂、反目成仇，至此开国美控制权之争大幕正式拉。 8月4日，国美电器第一大股东黄光裕以其控股公司(Shinning Crown Holdings Inc)的名义要求举行临时股东大会，动议撤销前股东大会给予董事会的20%增发授权，以及撤销陈晓的公司执行董事及董事局主席职务，随即，国美董事会在香港起诉黄，双方通过媒体采访和公开信的方式你来我往，相互指责和讨伐。国美事件成为当下商业世界最为关注的事件。 经历57天拉票战后，国美董事局9月28日召开特别股东大会，股东投票表决黄光裕各项提议，最终陈晓胜出，继续掌控国美电器，黄光裕收回增发权。 就在国美忙着内斗的同时，其老对手苏宁则不断再创佳绩，今年三季报显示，苏宁第三季度净增连锁店面131家，总店数达到1235家，创下历年季度开店新纪录。苏宁今年前三季度实现净利润28.3亿元，同比增长43.58%。而国美前三季净利润为14.4亿元，仅为苏宁一半。 多家券商预测，今年年底苏宁全面超越国美(包括非上市公司资产的国美门店)将成事实。至此我们可以说国美之争，最惨的输家是国美。 最决绝的抗议：富士康员工跳楼事件 除了国美纷争，另一件堪称2010年最沸沸扬扬的公司事件，就是富士康员工连续坠楼事件。其代工模式因此备受质疑。 自2009年岁末“马向前事件”后，今年3月以来富士康厂区接连发生跳楼、坠楼事件，这一全球500强之一的企业深陷“坠楼门”。而这一系列的连环跳将富士康内部存在的问题一下子暴露出来了。无疑，员工作出这样无奈的选择与企业管理制度是分不开的。 现如今，包括富士康在内的中国企业就主要靠低廉的劳动力，来赚取低廉的利润。但毕竟从廉价劳动力上获取利润始终有限。倚重劳动力成本优势的OEM(贴牌生产)模式有其局限性，企业想要发展必须要把由100%代工出口转型为以自主品牌出口为主，寻求新的利润增长点。 通过员工们决绝的抗议，其实富士康已意识到，必须从单一的代工模式走出来。郭台铭曾表示，在经历上一个黄金十年的繁荣后，下一个十年将是依赖于内地内需市场及科技转型的十年。 [编辑: 王好] 分享: 【 大 中 小 】【 rss订阅 】【 打印 】【 关闭 】 近日热点 市场预期年内或再加息 各大银行提前还贷潮涌现 2010 12/20 06:56 "年终工作总结"愁煞上班族 恶搞版网上疯传 2010 12/21 14:46 媒体称明起汽柴油每吨分别上调310元300元 2010 12/21 17:31 白领该去哪打拼 中国未来5大"聚宝地"(图) 2010 12/21 14:26 银行收费项目太多? 教你做"逃费达人" 2010 12/21 14:09 月供3000元 中年教师家庭如何过上无忧生活 2010 12/20 15:17 济南推出奢华圣诞大餐10万一桌 吃的不是饭 2010 12/20 15:41 80后硕士生回收废品 毕业前买车买房揽女友 2010 12/21 14:19 李宁进军体育地产受挫 市值一天内缩水30亿 2010 12/21 14:26 最牛购房者出书 与开发商死扛三年获赔(图) 2010 12/20 15:43

description.hltext_display: കരുവാറ്റ ഉപതെര.: ബി.ജെ.പി.സ്‌ഥാനാര്‍ഥിക്ക്‌ വിജയം
description.content: ഹരിപ്പാട്‌: കരുവാറ്റ ഗ്രാമപഞ്ചായത്ത്‌ 8-ാം വാര്‍ഡിലേക്ക്‌ നടന്ന ഉപതെരഞ്ഞെടുപ്പില്‍ ബി.ജെ.പിയില്‍ നിന്ന്‌ മത്സരിച്ച വിശ്വനാഥന്‍ 112 വോട്ടുകള്‍ക്ക്‌ വിജയിച്ചു. കോണ്‍ഗ്രസിലെ ആര്‍. വാസുദേവനാണ്‌ രണ്ടാം സ്‌ഥാനത്ത്‌. ഇടതുപക്ഷത്തിന്‍െറ കെ.പി. ഭാസ്‌കരന്‍ മൂന്നാംസ്‌ഥാനത്ത്‌. യു.ഡി.എഫ്‌. ഭരിക്കുന്ന പഞ്ചായത്തില്‍ യു.ഡി.എഫിന്‌ 9, എല്‍.ഡി.എഫിന്‌ 5 സീറ്റുകളാണ്‌ ഉണ്ടായിരുന്നത്‌. കെ.കെ. രവീന്ദ്രനാഥ്‌ വാഹനാപകടത്തില്‍ മരിച്ചതിനാലാണ്‌ തെരഞ്ഞെടുപ്പ്‌ മാറ്റിവച്ചത്‌.

description.hltext_display: 康师傅称家乐福欲抽成涨幅一半
description.content:
乐福与康师傅的“断货”风波在双方的和谈声中继续僵持着。
昨日，康师傅一位不愿透露姓名的知情人士告诉《第一财经日报》：“已经谈过一段时间，但是没有进展。我们产品要涨两毛，家乐福要扣除其中1毛，这是我们不能接受的。”虽然双方的谈判之门并未关闭，但要找到双方都能接受的方案尚存在一定难度。上述人士还表示，康师傅的涨价是针对所有卖场的，在其他卖场的加价已经完成，事实上一定范围的返点康师傅并不是不能接受。
对于这一说法，家乐福相关人士以不知情为由未予置评。
尽管家乐福方面一再强调双方的断货纠纷是由于家乐福不接受康师傅涨价所致，并一直表示在积极与康师傅进行和谈，但记者从知情人士处获悉，与沃尔玛、欧尚等同业需要保持低价不同，家乐福对供应商产品价格的涨跌并不是很在意，其最关心的是可以从供应商处获得多少分成及相关收费。比如同品牌的同一款纸巾，在家乐福的价格可能会比同业贵25%，只要双方谈妥扣点即可。
另据接近该事件的人士透露，家乐福通过管制货物的方式向供应商施压并非首次，“所谓管制货物就是指家乐福方面停止向供应商下单，这样供应商货物就无法进入家乐福系统。直到双方谈妥家乐福才继续进货。”该人士透露，一年中往往会有超过30种商品遭遇“管制”。由于库存起到了一定缓冲作用，因此这些矛盾并不会立刻在终端体现，“但康师傅货物周转率较快，因此双方矛盾才会被激化。”
持续僵持状态中，家乐福的存货已很难继续支撑。据家乐福内部人员透露，由于康师傅是家乐福方便面产品中占最大销售份额的品牌，目前库存已不多，不确定还能坚持到何时。
但康师傅并不担心目前的僵局。康师傅上述人士透露，全国现代商超渠道仅占公司销售总额的15%，而家乐福只是其中的一家，暂时的缺位并不会影响公司业绩。“我们在家乐福卖货是亏损的，家乐福对康师傅而言主要是一个货品展示的作用。”上述人士表示。
康师傅第三季度财报显示，当季公司毛利率同比下跌5.17%，然而当季度公司溢利却同比上升34.33%，每股溢利从去年同期的2.64美分上涨为3.59美分。康师傅方面对此的解释为管理和生产效率的提高以及规模效应。与此同时，据ACNielsen今年9月数据，康师傅方便面销售量与销售额的市场占有率分别上升至44.5%及 57.6%，其中容器面和高价袋面销售额的占有率分别为69.8%及72.2%，稳居市场领先地位十余年，中价袋面亦处领导地位，取得72.3%的市场占有率。这些都是康师傅强势的底气。
不少零售同业表示，在与康师傅、可口可乐、宝洁等强势供应商谈合作时，零售商都不敢提太高扣点，甚至近乎没有扣点，对方还对进货量和付款期有严格限制，比如宝洁会要求某些零售商每次进货量必须达到600箱，且账期仅7天，否则就断货，一些规模较小的卖场只能联合进货。因此，康师傅事件让诸多零售商深度思考与大型供应商的合作问题。

description.hltext_display: Terror Arrests: More Time To Question 12 Men
description.content:
Police have been given more time to question 12 men – including 1 arrested in Birmingham over fears of a “significant” terror plot.
Officers at the West Midlands Counter Terrorism unit were granted another five days to detain the men, from Cardiff, London and Stoke.
The 12 suspects – aged between 17 and 28 and at least five of Bangladeshi origin – were held during early-morning raids by unarmed officers on Monday.
The arrests were spurred by fears a group was ramping up its activities after months of surveillance and monitoring by counter-terrorism officers and colleagues at MI5.
Lord Carlile – the independent reviewer of counter-terrorism powers – who observed part of the surveillance operation on the suspects, said they were under observation for a long time.
He told the Commons Home Affairs Select Committee a briefing he had received showed “allegations of a significant plot”.
Sources said police were investigating if the suspects were inspired by al Qaeda but played down speculation they may have been planning a Christmas or New Year bomb attack.
Officials said the operation was not linked to the recent failed Stockholm suicide bombing or the Yemen al Qaeda printer bomb plot.
The fact the officers undertaking the raids were unarmed suggests police had no information that the men had guns, explosive devices or other potential weapons.
Scotland Yard Assistant Commissioner John Yates said the case has highlighted how the public must remain vigilant and urged anyone who witnesses suspicious activity to report it as the national threat level remains severe.
Speaking outside New Scotland Yard, Mr Yates said: “With the information we have, I believe (Monday’s) arrests were absolutely necessary in order to keep the public safe.”
All 12 suspects were detained on suspicion of the commission, preparation or instigation of an act of terrorism in Britain.
Iraqi officials claimed last week that captured insurgents believed the Stockholm bombing was part of a series of Christmas season attacks.
But both British and German officials insisted there were no specific threats to their countries over the festive period.

event_or_fact.property: ?With the information we have, I believe (Monday?s) arrests were absolutely necessary in order to keep the public safe.? All 12 suspects were detained on suspicion of the commission, preparation or instigation of an act of terrorism in Britain
a briefing he had received showed ?allegations of a significant plot?
the case has highlighted how the public must remain vigilant and urged anyone who witnesses suspicious activity to report it as the national threat level remains severe

description.hltext_display: Educação quer independência de demais secretarias
description.content:
Com o objetivo de melhorar a logística de trabalho e garantir o desenvolvimento pedagógico, a Secretaria Municipal de Educação elaborou nova estrutura organizacional, que já foi enviada para a Câmara Municipal, mas cuja votação foi adiada na sessão realizada anteontem.
A secretaria, com mais de 2.000 servidores e orçamento maior que o de muitas cidades, mantinha o mesmo organograma há mais de 20 anos. Para se adequar às necessidades atuais, a restruturação prevê a criação de novas divisões e um novo departamento, além de uma comissão interna para realizar os processos licitatórios da área. Para a secretária Vera Regino Caserio, o novo organograma vai deixar a pasta mais ágil e independente das outras pastas.
Segundo a secretária, com o projeto o quadro atual de cerca de 60 funcionários administrativos – que engloba também servidores da merenda, limpeza, vigilantes – passará a contar com outros 20 servidores. “A Secretaria de Educação cresceu muito na cidade. Hoje temos dois mil funcionários e a estrutura permanece a mesma há muitos anos. Ao pensar o novo organograma, pensamos não só nas dificuldades que enfrentamos hoje, mas também no que poderia se apresentar no futuro. Dessa forma, criamos divisões, mas não vamos lotar todos os cargos”, afirma Vera.
Ela destaca que uma das dificuldades a ser superada é no apoio pedagógico. A secretária afirma que atualmente os profissionais dessa área também desempenham funções administrativas, concorrendo com visitas às unidades e orientações. “Ao final, as diretoras de divisão ligadas à área pedagógica estão também ligadas ao administrativo e pouco podem fazer na pedagogia”, observa. Para isso, ela informa que o novo organograma contemplará uma divisão para esse apoio.
Ainda visando a melhoria no suporte pedagógico no municípios, Vera afirma que o Departamento Pedagógico vai mudar de nome para Departamento de Planejamento, Projeto e Pesquisas Educacionais. “A estrutura hoje é precária, engloba formação continuada, núcleo de aperfeiçoamento, biblioteca, multimeios, cursos, eventos. Além da nomenclatura mais adequada, vamos investir nesse setor”, ressalta.
Outras mudanças
Os departamentos de Educação Infantil e Ensino Fundamental também terão suas estruturas ampliadas. O primeiro passará de cinco para oito divisões. Uma será exclusiva para atendimento das entidades conveniadas e para o acompanhamento das 38 escolas de educação infantil particulares da cidade. “É de responsabilidade da Educação checar a documentação, acompanhar e fiscalizar possíveis denúncias sobre essas unidades”, explica Vera.
Já o Departamento de Ensino Fundamental passará de uma para três divisões, três delas para atender as 16 Escolas Municipais de Ensino Fundamental (Emef) da cidade, uma para a Educação de Jovens e Adultos (EJA) e outra para o ensino especial. A merenda escolar também ganhará outra estrutura. Ela terá uma divisão de nutrição, uma de controle e planejamento, que ficará responsável pela logística da distribuição dos alimentos, estoque e armazenamento e a divisão de apoio, para gerenciamento de convênios e contratos.
Com a retomada dos polos de informática nas unidades de educação fundamental e a interligação da rede nas escolas infantis, Vera justifica a criação de um setor específico de Tecnologia da Informação dentro da pasta. “Para o atendimento tecnológico, manutenção, acompanhamento da rede. Precisamos ter um suporte para isso e atualmente temos apenas um estagiário”, informa.
Porém, ela admite que todas as mudanças propostas ainda levarão tempo para serem implantadas. “As alterações não ocorreram imediatamente. Entendemos essa necessidade de conhecer melhor oque pretendemos. Mas acredito que em 2011 sermos capazes de implementar”, garante.
Equipe de licitação e almoxarifado próprios
Vera Caserio também afirma que a proposta enviada à Câmara contempla a criação de um departamento de administração. “Ele terá divisão administrativa, expediente e de pessoal, arquivo, banco de dados. A divisão de compras e licitações ficará vinculada a este departamento”, observa a secretária. O almoxarifado também vai se desligar do que está vinculado ao restante da administração.
A comissão de licitação da pasta já foi aprovada pelo Legislativo e seguirá os moldes da que existe na Secretaria Municipal de Saúde. “A comissão terá sua formação publicada em breve no Diário Oficial de Bauru. E se você cria essa comissão, é preciso criar um núcleo de gestão de finanças na Educação”, avalia Vera.
“Ao restruturar a maior secretaria do município, maior que muitas empresas, com um orçamento grande, acredito que ficaremos independentes de outras secretárias. Até para desafogar a prefeitura. Ao criar a comissão por exemplo, abre espaço na administração para licitações de outras secretarias”, pondera.
“Como em 2010, a pasta passou também a subvencionar as escolas, para pequenas compras, por exemplo, também será instituído nesse núcleo estrutura para acompanhar esses gastos, além de prestações de contas”, explicou a secretária.
Outras ações previstas para 2011 contemplam a construção de um almoxarifado exclusivo para os materiais da pasta. “Para acompanhar entrada e saída de produtos da própria secretaria. Além disso, a seção de patrimônio está levantando todos os materiais pertencentes à pasta e cada unidade, para termos um conhecimento melhor dos bens”, afirma a secretária. Será criada também uma seção de frota para controlar os veículos da Educação, além de uma seção específica para de transporte escolar e de manutenção de próprios.
Para a secretária todas as mudanças previstas representarão melhora no dia a dia da pasta. “A logística é importante para nós. Hoje, por exemplo, a merenda tem a sua distribuição feita muito bem, mas o trabalho é feito na unha. Isso vai significar economia, trabalhar bem com o dinheiro público”, avalia.
Ainda para 2011, a pasta terá outros dois grandes desafios: a elaboração do novo estatuto do magistério e o plano municipal da Educação. De acordo com Vera, o estatuto já foi revisado e alterado. “Alguns pontos ainda precisam ser discutidos, mas em breve será enviado para análise da Secretaria Municipal dos Negócios Jurídicos”, afirma. O plano ainda está em discussão.
